custom_nodes.author: room3dev
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-FrameIO
custom_nodes.description: High-performance frame IO nodes (WEBP)

custom_nodes.author: CornmeisterNL
custom_nodes.title: CornmeisterNL PowerPack
custom_nodes.description: A power-user focused collection of ComfyUI nodes: LoRA management, prompt building, resolution presets, metadata-safe image saving (CivitAI-ready), and UNet model loading.

custom_nodes.author: LuqP2
custom_nodes.title: Image MetaHub Save Node
custom_nodes.description: Official companion node for Image MetaHub. Saves A1111/Civitai-compatible parameters plus extended Image MetaHub metadata (workflow JSON, SHA256 model hashes, VRAM peak/total, GPU device, generation time, and steps/sec) for reproducibility and benchmarking.

custom_nodes.author: EricRollei
custom_nodes.title: Qwen Layers Diffuser Pipeline
custom_nodes.description: Decompose images into semantic RGBA layers using Qwen-Image-Layered model. Features AI-powered layer naming, PSD/TIFF export with proper layer structure, original resolution support, and VRAM management. Includes 18 nodes for layer decomposition, manipulation, and saving.

custom_nodes.author: revisionhiep-create
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-Prompt-Sorter
custom_nodes.description: Interactive button-based trigger word manager with precision weighting and portable collections.

custom_nodes.author: LAOGOU-666
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LG_SamplingUtils
custom_nodes.description: This is a toolset designed for ComfyUI by LAOGOU-666, providing a series of practical sampling nodes, making our operation more intuitive and convenient

custom_nodes.author: Faildes
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TC_ADV_ZPrompt
custom_nodes.description: Extension that allows to use emphasize and AND on Z-Image.

custom_nodes.author: id7238
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PackedPipes
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes that organize ComfyUI workflow connections by combining multiple links into single pipeline links. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: revisionhiep-create
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-universal-trigger-toggle
custom_nodes.description: A standalone custom node for ComfyUI that provides an interactive tag-based interface to enable/disable trigger words from any LoRA loader or gallery node.

custom_nodes.author: nawka12
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Adept-Sampler
custom_nodes.description: Advanced custom samplers and schedulers for ComfyUI, ported from the Stable Diffusion WebUI reForge extension.

custom_nodes.author: zhuyanan
custom_nodes.title: Comfy-FilmSimulator
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI node: realistic, adaptive film simulation for photographic and cinematic looks.

custom_nodes.author: Wakapedia
custom_nodes.title: WanVideo Wakawave - Advanced LoRA & Prompt Tools
custom_nodes.description: Advanced LoRA management and prompt building tools for WanVideo. Features: Wakawave LoRA Loader (unlimited LoRAs, save/load presets, drag-to-reorder, per-LoRA strength control), Wakawave Prompt Builder (dual positive/negative prompts, weight control, segment mode, visual preset browser with import/export).

custom_nodes.author: ConstantlyGrowup
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Qwen_chat_models
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom nodes for Qwen text and vision-language models. Supports Qwen2.5/Qwen3, 4-/8-bit quantization, deterministic seeding, auto model download, and shared caching to improve workflow performance.

custom_nodes.author: huihuihuiz
custom_nodes.title: UNet Downloader for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: huihuihuiz
custom_nodes.title: Plugin Downloader for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node for downloading and backing up all custom nodes/plugins as ZIP files.

custom_nodes.author: huihuihuiz
custom_nodes.title: Upscaler Downloader for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node for downloading and managing upscaler/super-resolution models directly within the UI.

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-STARWrapper
custom_nodes.description: An experimental STAR Video Upscale Wrapper.

custom_nodes.author: ttulttul

custom_nodes.author: Shadowwalker0P

custom_nodes.author: Verolelb
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Video-Workbench
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node that acts as a mini video editing studio, automatically assembling multiple video clips from a folder with intelligent resolution resizing, aspect ratio handling, and frame rate management.

custom_nodes.author: BlackVortexAI

Supports 9 languages and 18+ Chinese dialects with automatic model downloading and caching.
